article_metadata.description: BARSTOW — The area is suffering from a doctor shortage, but Barstow Community Hospital officials say they are busy working on the cure.Using 2011 data, the Healthcare Atlas shows there are 2,407 civilians per primary care physician within the region that includes Barstow, Daggett, Lenwood, Nebo Center, Oro Grande and Yermo. The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services Health Resources and Service Administration designates it as a medically undeserved area.But many Barstow area
article_metadata.author: Mike Lamb Staff Writer
